'''Clorinde'''  is a playable {{Color|Ousia}}-aligned {{Electro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the strongest [[Champion Duelist]] in Fontaine<ref> {{Ref/Quest|The City of Rains and Remembrance}}</ref> and once served as [[Furina]]'s bodyguard.
